body: In the shop it, says subscription and one time, one does one time and subscription means?
body_tagged: In the shop it, says subscription and one time, one does one time and subscription means?
title: Whats a subscription and one time?

replies.body: Subscription is you pay monthly for the rank; while, One time is you pay once for the designated amount of money
replies.body_tagged: Subscription is you pay monthly for the rank; while, One time is you pay once for the designated amount of money

replies.body:
One time means you pay the amount up front, like emerald it is 50
subscrtion means you pay 10 over time, till you get to 50, subscription is generally used to see if they want the rank or not.
replies.body_tagged:
One time means you pay the amount up front, like emerald it is 50
subscrtion means you pay 10 over time, till you get to 50, subscription is generally used to see if they want the rank or not.

replies.body: Subscription wouldn't stop at $50. It stops when you choose to, and at that time your rank would end.
replies.body_tagged: Subscription wouldn't stop at $50. It stops when you choose to, and at that time your rank would end.
